name: Civitatem
description: Civitatem is a medieval city builder where you help your villagers raise a new settlement in dangerous lands by making use of their skills and available world resources.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT/s 2xx or Equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space
